MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 13-NOV-2020 15:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the PA17 postcode area of Skelmorlie, affecting properties in Barrhill Camp and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:30pm due to faulty overhead equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:35pm on Friday, 13 November 2020
